sentences.en: He has accused local people of trying to besmirch his reputation.
sentences.cn: 他指责当地人企图败坏他的名声。

sentences.en: The scandalous remarks in the newspaper besmirch the reputations of every member of the society.
sentences.cn: 报刊上那些恶意中伤的报道败坏了该社团全体成员的名声.

trans.tran_en: If you besmirch someone or their reputation, you say that they are a bad person or that they have done something wrong, usually when this is not true

trans.tran_cn: 弄脏，玷污，丑化，糟蹋（名誉等）
